With the help of his trusty sidekick Chewbacca (played by David Prowse), Han Solo is able to rescue the princess and save Planet Druidia from the clutches of the evil Spaceballs.

"Spaceballs" has become a beloved classic 80s sci-fi comedy that continues to entertain audiences today.
